#summary Installing the plugin from the update site

= Installing =

The Concordion Eclipse Plugin can be installed from the update site at [http://concordion-eclipse.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/org.concordion.ide.eclipse.update-site].

This is the official update site and contains released versions only. 

= Development Versions =

The site's repo at [https://github.com/matf/org.concordion.ide.eclipse.update-site] contains development versions of the plugin. To use it, download the site as zip on github, unpack the zip and add a new local Eclipse update site pointing to the unpacked site.
